divs: Sighting DetailsWatching the Disneyland fireworks from the hill that I live on, the sighting lasted for almost one hour, the camera I used was of poor quality and did not capture the size or the many different changes in lighting and shape that the UFO transformed into during the sighting period. I have no idea what the object was, although the Indigo color's were like nothing that I have ever seen before in the sky from any kind of flying machine, in addition to this color it was at times red, green, white. with lights that actually seperated and then came back together, it appeared to be over the 91 fry and 57 exchange up about 300 feet off the ground, it moved from left to right slightly but stayed in the same location for the hour that we observed it.
Summary: Multi color lights saucer shaped changing shape and color for approx. one hour
